name: "migrate-confluence-space"
description: "Plan a Confluence space migration using MCP tools."
---

# Migrate Confluence Space

Confirm the migration strategy before exporting any content.

## Required
- Source space key/name
- Target output path or repository folder
- Scope (all pages vs. subset)

## Optional
- Attachment handling, image rewriting, page hierarchy mapping, label filters

## Output
- Stepwise plan: discovery, export, transform, validate.
- Call out limits (rate, size), credentials needed, and cleanup steps.
- Draft the MCP commands/tool parameters for approval before execution.
